summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 DODGE JOURNEY. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE ABS AND TRACTION CONTROL WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. ALSO, WHILE BRAKING AT SPEEDS OVER 45 MPH, THE BRAKING DISTANCE WAS EXTENDED. THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER WERE NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURES. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 71,600.
